amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of any funds appropriated in the bill for the construction of a new office facility campus at the Beltsville (Maryland) Agricultural Research Center.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to prohibit any funds appropriated in the bill for new construction at the Beltsville (Maryland) Agricultural Research Center.

action.text: On agreeing to the Sanford amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 221 (Roll No. 548).
